price: If We willed, We could send down upon them a sign from the heaven, at which their necks would stay bowed in humility[3].
arabic: إِن نَّشَأۡ نُنَزِّلۡ عَلَيۡهِم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ ءَايَةٗ فَظَلَّتۡ أَعۡنَٰقُهُمۡ لَهَا خَٰضِعِينَ
footnotes: [3] i.e., they would be compelled to believe, being humbled.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: in nasha nunazzil ʿalayhim mina al-samāi āyatan faẓallat aʿnāquhum lahā khāḍiʿīna
